scripts.postinstall: mkdir styleguide; cd styleguide; git init; git remote add -f origin https://github.com/kvas-damian/styleguide.git; git config core.sparseCheckout true; echo "packages/react-components" >> .git/info/sparse-checkout; git pull --depth=1 origin update-to-react16; npm install; cd ..; npm i ./styleguide/packages/react-components/
